verses.verse: Give ear, <S%H238><s%> you heavens, <S%H8064><s%> and I will speak. <S%H1696><s%> Let the earth <S%H776><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

My doctrine <S%H3948><s%> shall drop <S%H6201><s%> as the rain. <S%H4306><s%> My speech <S%H565><s%> shall condense <S%H5140><s%> as the dew, <S%H2919><s%> as the small rain <S%H8164><s%> on the tender grass, <S%H6212><s%> as the showers <S%H7241><s%> on the herb. <S%H6212><s%>
For I will proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Ascribe <S%H3051><s%> greatness <S%H1433><s%> to our God! <S%H430><s%>

The Rock, <S%H6697><s%> his work <S%H6467><s%> is perfect, <S%H8549><s%> for all his ways <S%H1870><s%> are justice: <S%H4941><s%> a God <S%H410><s%> of faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and without iniquity, <S%H5766><s%> just <S%H6662><s%> and right is he. <S%H3477><s%>

They have dealt corruptly <S%H7843><s%> with him. <S%H3971><s%> They are not his children, <S%H1121><s%> because of their defect. <S%H6141><s%> They are a perverse and crooked <S%H6618><s%> generation. <S%H1755><s%>

Do you thus requite <S%H1580><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> foolish <S%H5036><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> and unwise? <S%H2450><s%> Isn't <S%H1><s%> he your father who has bought <S%H7069><s%> you? <S%H6213><s%> He has made you, <S%H3559><s%> and established you.

Remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old. <S%H5769><s%> Consider <S%H995><s%> the years <S%H8141><s%> of many <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%> Ask <S%H7592><s%> your father, <S%H1><s%> and he will show <S%H5046><s%> you; <S%H2205><s%> your elders, and they will tell you. <S%H559><s%>

When the Most High <S%H5945><s%> gave <S%H5157><s%> to the nations <S%H1471><s%> their inheritance, <S%H5157><s%> when he separated <S%H6504><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> he set <S%H5324><s%> the bounds <S%H1367><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s portion <S%H2506><s%> is his people. <S%H5971><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is the lot <S%H2256><s%> of his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

He found <S%H4672><s%> him in a desert <S%H4057><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> in the waste <S%H8414><s%> howling <S%H3214><s%> wilderness. <S%H3452><s%> He surrounded <S%H5437><s%> him. <S%H995><s%> He cared for him. <S%H5341><s%> He kept him as the apple <S%H380><s%> of his eye. <S%H5869><s%>

As an eagle <S%H5404><s%> that stirs up <S%H5782><s%> her nest, <S%H7064><s%> that flutters <S%H7363><s%> over her young, <S%H1469><s%> he spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> his wings, <S%H84><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> them, <S%H5375><s%> he bore them on his feathers. <S%H84><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> alone <S%H910><s%> led <S%H5148><s%> him. <S%H5236><s%> There was no foreign god with him. <S%H410><s%>

He made him ride <S%H7392><s%> on the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%> He ate <S%H398><s%> the increase <S%H8570><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%> He caused him to suck <S%H3243><s%> honey <S%H1706><s%> out of the rock, <S%H5553><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> out of the flinty <S%H2496><s%> rock; <S%H6697><s%>

Butter <S%H2529><s%> of the herd, <S%H1241><s%> and milk <S%H2461><s%> of the flock, <S%H6629><s%> with fat <S%H2459><s%> of lambs, <S%H3733><s%> rams <S%H352><s%> of the breed <S%H1121><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> and goats, <S%H6260><s%> with the <S%H2459><s%> finest <S%H3629><s%> of the wheat. <S%H2406><s%> Of the <S%H2561><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> of the grape <S%H6025><s%> you drank wine. <S%H8354><s%>

But Jeshurun <S%H3484><s%> grew fat, <S%H8080><s%> and kicked. <S%H1163><s%> You have grown fat. <S%H8080><s%> You have grown thick. <S%H5666><s%> You have become sleek. <S%H3780><s%> Then he forsook <S%H5203><s%> God <S%H433><s%> who made <S%H6213><s%> him, <S%H5034><s%> and lightly esteemed the Rock <S%H6697><s%> of his salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
They moved him to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with strange <S%H2114><s%> gods. <S%H3707><s%> They provoked him to anger with abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

They sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to demons, <S%H7700><s%> not God, <S%H433><s%> to gods <S%H430><s%> that they didn't <S%H3045><s%> know, to new <S%H2319><s%> gods that came <S%H935><s%> up <S%H935><s%> recently, <S%H7138><s%> which your fathers <S%H1><s%> didn't <S%H8175><s%> dread.
Of the Rock <S%H6697><s%> who became your father, <S%H3205><s%> you are unmindful, <S%H7876><s%> and have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> God <S%H410><s%> who gave you birth. <S%H2342><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> and abhorred, <S%H5006><s%> because of the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of his sons <S%H1121><s%> and his daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "I will hide <S%H5641><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> from them. <S%H7200><s%> I will see what their end <S%H319><s%> shall be; <S%H8419><s%> for they are a very perverse generation, <S%H1755><s%> children <S%H1121><s%> in whom is no faithfulness. <S%H529><s%>

They have moved me to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with that which is not <S%H3808><s%> God. <S%H410><s%> They have provoked me to anger <S%H3707><s%> with their vanities. <S%H1892><s%> I will move them to jealousy <S%H7065><s%> with those who are not a people. <S%H5971><s%> I will provoke them to anger <S%H3707><s%> with a foolish <S%H5036><s%> nation. <S%H1471><s%>

For a fire <S%H784><s%> is kindled <S%H6919><s%> in my anger, <S%H639><s%> Burns <S%H3344><s%> to the lowest <S%H8482><s%> Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> Devours <S%H398><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> with its increase, <S%H2981><s%> and sets the foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> on fire. <S%H3857><s%>
"I will heap <S%H5595><s%> evils <S%H7451><s%> on them. <S%H3615><s%> I will spend my arrows on them. <S%H2671><s%>

They shall be wasted <S%H4198><s%> with hunger, <S%H7458><s%> and devoured <S%H3898><s%> with burning heat <S%H7565><s%> and bitter <S%H4815><s%> destruction. <S%H6986><s%> I will send <S%H7971><s%> the teeth <S%H8127><s%> of animals <S%H929><s%> on them, <S%H2534><s%> With the poison of crawling <S%H2119><s%> things of the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

Outside <S%H2351><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall bereave, <S%H7921><s%> and in the rooms, <S%H2315><s%> terror; <S%H367><s%> on both young man <S%H970><s%> and virgin, <S%H1330><s%> The nursing <S%H3243><s%> infant with the gray-haired <S%H7872><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>
I said, <S%H559><s%> I would scatter them afar. <S%H6284><s%> I would make their memory <S%H2143><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> from among men; <S%H582><s%>

were it not <S%H3884><s%> that I feared <S%H1481><s%> the provocation <S%H3708><s%> of the enemy, <S%H341><s%> lest their adversaries <S%H6862><s%> should judge wrongly, <S%H5234><s%> lest they should say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3027><s%> 'Our hand is exalted, <S%H7311><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has not done all this. <S%H6466><s%>'"
For they are a nation <S%H1471><s%> void <S%H6><s%> of counsel. <S%H6098><s%> There is no understanding in them. <S%H8394><s%>
Oh that <S%H3863><s%> they were wise, <S%H2449><s%> that they understood <S%H7919><s%> this, <S%H995><s%> that they would consider their latter end! <S%H319><s%>

How could one <S%H259><s%> chase <S%H7291><s%> a thousand, <S%H505><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> put ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> to flight, <S%H5127><s%> unless <S%H3808><s%> their Rock <S%H6697><s%> had sold <S%H4376><s%> them, <S%H3588><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had delivered them up? <S%H5462><s%>
For their rock <S%H6697><s%> is not as our Rock, <S%H6697><s%> even our enemies <S%H341><s%> themselves being judges. <S%H6414><s%>

For their vine <S%H1612><s%> is of the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sodom, <S%H5467><s%> of the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Gomorrah. <S%H6017><s%> Their grapes <S%H6025><s%> are grapes <S%H6025><s%> of gall, <S%H7219><s%> Their clusters <S%H811><s%> are bitter. <S%H4846><s%>
Their wine <S%H3196><s%> is the poison <S%H2534><s%> of serpents, <S%H8577><s%> The cruel <S%H393><s%> venom <S%H7219><s%> of asps. <S%H6620><s%>
"Isn't <S%H3647><s%> this laid up in store with me, <S%H2856><s%> sealed up among my treasures? <S%H214><s%>

Vengeance <S%H5359><s%> is mine, <S%H8005><s%> and recompense, at the time <S%H6256><s%> when their foot <S%H7272><s%> slides; <S%H4131><s%> for the day <S%H3117><s%> of their calamity <S%H343><s%> is at hand. <S%H7138><s%> The things that are to come <S%H6264><s%> on them shall make haste. <S%H2363><s%>"

For Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> and have compassion <S%H5162><s%> on his servants, <S%H5650><s%> when he sees <S%H7200><s%> that their power <S%H3027><s%> is gone, <S%H235><s%> There is none <S%H657><s%> remaining, <S%H6113><s%> shut up or left at large. <S%H5800><s%>
He will say, <S%H559><s%> "Where are their gods, <S%H430><s%> The rock <S%H6697><s%> in which they took refuge; <S%H2620><s%>

Which ate <S%H398><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> of their sacrifices, <S%H2077><s%> And drank <S%H8354><s%> the wine <S%H3196><s%> of their drink offering? <S%H5257><s%> Let them rise up <S%H6965><s%> and help <S%H5826><s%> you! <S%H5643><s%> Let them be your protection.

"See <S%H7200><s%> now that I, <S%H430><s%> even I, am he, There is no god with me. <S%H4191><s%> I kill, and I make alive. <S%H2421><s%> I wound, <S%H4272><s%> and I heal. <S%H7495><s%> There is no one who can deliver <S%H5337><s%> out of my hand. <S%H3027><s%>
For I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> to heaven, <S%H8064><s%> And say, <S%H559><s%> As I live <S%H2416><s%> forever, <S%H5769><s%>

if I whet <S%H8150><s%> my glittering <S%H1300><s%> sword, <S%H2719><s%> My hand <S%H3027><s%> take hold <S%H270><s%> on judgment; <S%H4941><s%> I will render <S%H7725><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> to my adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> and will recompense <S%H7999><s%> those who hate me. <S%H8130><s%>

I will make my arrows <S%H2671><s%> drunk <S%H7937><s%> with blood. <S%H1818><s%> My sword <S%H2719><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> with the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the slain <S%H2491><s%> and the captives, <S%H7633><s%> from the head <S%H7218><s%> of the leaders <S%H6546><s%> of the enemy. <S%H341><s%>"

Rejoice, <S%H7442><s%> you nations, <S%H1471><s%> with his people, <S%H5971><s%> for he will avenge <S%H5358><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of his servants. <S%H5650><s%> He will render <S%H7725><s%> vengeance <S%H5359><s%> to his adversaries, <S%H6862><s%> And will make expiation <S%H3722><s%> for his land, <S%H127><s%> for his people. <S%H5971><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spoke <S%H1696><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this song <S%H7892><s%> in the ears <S%H241><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> he and Joshua <S%H1954><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun. <S%H5126><s%>
Moses <S%H4872><s%> made an end <S%H3615><s%> of speaking <S%H1696><s%> all these words <S%H1697><s%> to all Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H7760><s%> "Set your heart <S%H3824><s%> to all the words <S%H1697><s%> which I testify <S%H5749><s%> to you this day, <S%H3117><s%> which you shall command <S%H6680><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> to observe <S%H8104><s%> to do, <S%H6213><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of this law. <S%H8451><s%>

For it is no vain <S%H7386><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> for you; <S%H2416><s%> because it is your life, and through this thing <S%H1697><s%> you shall prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land, <S%H127><s%> where you go over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> to possess it. <S%H3423><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> that same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Go up <S%H5927><s%> into this mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> to Mount <S%H2022><s%> Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> that is over against <S%H6440><s%> Jericho; <S%H3405><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for a possession; <S%H272><s%>

and die <S%H4191><s%> on the mountain <S%H2022><s%> where you go up, <S%H5927><s%> and be gathered <S%H622><s%> to your people, <S%H5971><s%> as Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> on Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor, <S%H2023><s%> and was gathered <S%H622><s%> to his people: <S%H5971><s%>

because you trespassed <S%H4603><s%> against me in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah of Kadesh, <S%H4808><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin; <S%H6790><s%> because you didn't <S%H6942><s%> sanctify me in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For you shall see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> before you; <S%H935><s%> but you shall not go there into the land <S%H776><s%> which I give <S%H5414><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
